snippet.title: Don't Be Afraid - Date Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Don't Be Afraid is a horror adventure game in which you impersonate a boy kidnapped by a psychopath. As you explore the gigantic house of your torturer, you will soon discover secrets that will surpass your childish imagination...

👉Follow us on Facebook:
https://bit.ly/37umYcP
